title: The Box Set: Jake & Lucas Books 1-3
description: GAY BDSM EROTICA. ***THREE BOOKS IN ONE*** THE BOX SET is a collection of the first three books in the JAKE & LUCAS series. In these books, 25-year-old Lucas Devero is transformed from an alpha hottie with everything going for him--great tech job, sick car, and killer body, and all the college boys he wants--into leatherman Jake Heller's no-limit slave boy. Hot-stuff Lucas wanted to know what it feels like to lose control. But the techie hottie did not realize he was submitting himself to a man who shows no mercy. By the end, Lucas Devero is willing to do anything to please his new master. But will it be enough to satisfy Jake Heller's hardcore demands? HARDCORE ACTION
author: S.F. Tanner
